data.eml:eml: Psallusthomashenryi sp. n. and Psalluslucanicus from Turkey (Hemiptera, Heteroptera, Miridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carapezza, Attilio, Kment, Petr (2018): Psallusthomashenryi sp. n. and Psalluslucanicus from Turkey (Hemiptera, Heteroptera, Miridae). ZooKeys 796: 253-265, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.796.21536, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.796.21536
